name: CraftingInventory
description: The CraftingInventory class provides specialized access to Minecraft's crafting table interface, allowing scripts to interact with crafting operations, manage the 3×3 crafting grid, and work with recipes.
overview:
This class extends the RecipeInventory class and adds crafting table-specific functionality for accessing input slots, managing recipes, and controlling the recipe book.

Crafting tables in Minecraft have the following main components:
- 3×3 Crafting Grid (Slots 1-9): Input slots for crafting materials
- Output Slot (Slot 0): The resulting crafted item
- Recipe Book: Toggleable interface for browsing and selecting recipes

methods.name: getInput
methods.description: Gets the input item from the specific coordinates in the 3x3 crafting grid.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The X coordinate of the grid (0-2).

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The Y coordinate of the grid (0-2).

methods.name: getInput
methods.description: Retrieves the entire 3x3 crafting grid as a 2D array of items.
